comments.content:
It appears that someone married a decorative initial |F| (possibly hand-drawn) to |errara| set in Brush BQ:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/brush-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331232402/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/brush-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/brush-bq/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331232402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BrushBQ_3502.png)

Haven’t found a match to the |F| yet....
